org.gearvrf

Class GVRPostEffectShaderManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gearvrf.GVRHybridObject
      • org.gearvrf.GVRBaseShaderManager<GVRPostEffectMap,GVRCustomPostEffectShaderId>
        • org.gearvrf.GVRPostEffectShaderManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GVRShaderManagers<GVRPostEffectMap,GVRCustomPostEffectShaderId>

    public class GVRPostEffectShaderManager
extends GVRBaseShaderManager<GVRPostEffectMap,GVRCustomPostEffectShaderId>
implements GVRShaderManagers<GVRPostEffectMap,GVRCustomPostEffectShaderId>
    Manages post-effect shaders, for modifying the texture holding the rendered scene graph, before lens distortion is applied. Get the singleton from GVRContext.getPostEffectShaderManager()

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.gearvrf.GVRHybridObject

        GVRHybridObject.CleanupHandlerListManager, GVRHybridObject.NativeCleanupHandler

      • addShader

        public GVRCustomPostEffectShaderId addShader(java.lang.String vertexShader,
                                             java.lang.String fragmentShader)
        Description copied from interface: GVRShaderManagers
        Builds a shader program from the supplied vertex and fragment shader code.
        Specified by:
        addShader in interface GVRShaderManagers<GVRPostEffectMap,GVRCustomPostEffectShaderId>
        Parameters:
        vertexShader - GLSL source code for a vertex shader.
        fragmentShader - GLSL source code for a fragment shader.
        Returns:
        An opaque type that you can pass to getShaderMap(ID), or to the GVRMaterial and GVRPostEffect constructors and setShader methods.
